name: Zombie Hospital ! Week1
description:
Game made in a week for fun. You wake up in a hospital and encounter some rather unpleasant people. Try to make your way out of the building and uncovered the mystery of this hospital.

Controls:

  • Arrows or W/S to move towards or away from the mouse
  • E to interact with doors
  • R to reload.
  • Esc to Pause

Dev comments:

The game was made with Unity. I tried to export to WEB GL but encountered a few bugs so currently only the windows build is available.
